name: Herts Mobile
description: Herts Mobile, the app for University of Hertfordshire Students, Staff and Visitors.   With Herts Mobile you can: - Find your way around campus and get directions to any building or room. - View local bus stops and see upcoming departures. - Receive notifications for timetable changes, events and more. Choose the types of notification youd like to receive so you only get the updates youre interested in.  - Find answers to your questions with Ask Herts including information on Registration, Food and Drink, Sports, Entertainment, Societies and more. - Find available computers by building, floor and zone.  What would you like to see next in Herts Mobile? Let us know!
